title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4217.15 - Special betting races
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4217.15 - Special betting races

State Regulations

Prior to permitting pari-mutuel betting on any other
than the usual win, place and show pool in a race or the daily double pool on
the first and second races, the licensee of a quarter horse race track shall
apply for and receive the approval of the commission, and such special betting
races shall only be conducted as provided for in the rules and regulations and
by the order of the commission. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4217.15

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
